member.name: T:ClrWinApi.SHFILEOPSTRUCT
member.summary: [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, CharSet=CharSet.Unicode)] If you use the above you may encounter an invalid memory access exception (when using ANSI or see nothing (when using unicode) when you use FOF_SIMPLEPROGRESS flag.

member.name: F:ClrWinApi.FileOpFlags.NORECURSEREPARSE
member.summary: Treat reparse points as objects, not containers

member.name: F:ClrWinApi.FileOpFlags.WANTNUKEWARNING
member.summary: During delete operation, warn if nuking instead of recycling (partially overrides FOF_NOCONFIRMATION)

member.name: F:ClrWinApi.FileOpFlags.NOCOPYSECURITYATTRIBS
member.summary: Dont copy NT file Security Attributes

member.name: F:ClrWinApi.FileOpFlags.NOCONFIRMMKDIR
member.summary: Don't confirm making any needed dirs

member.name: F:ClrWinApi.FileOpFlags.WANTMAPPINGHANDLE
member.summary: Fill in SHFILEOPSTRUCT.hNameMappings. Must be freed using SHFreeNameMappings
